/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of modern and traditional styles that are characteristic of Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
